original_text: They went inside the hole in the rock, but they did not find the body of the Lord Jesus there.
korean_text: 들어가니 주 예수의 시체가 보이지 아니하더라

sentences.original_text: They went inside the hole in the rock
but they did not find the body of the Lord Jesus there
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에서 주 예수의 시신을 찾지 못했다
